abilities.name: Death Guard Defenders
abilities.rule: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly **DEATH GUARD INFANTRY** units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Fevered Strategist
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, one model from your army with this ability can use it when a friendly **DEATH GUARD** unit within 12" of that model is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Miasma of Pestilence
abilities.rule: While a friendly **DEATH GUARD** unit is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
